items.description: The River Burn from Southgate and Waterden to Burnham Thorpe
items.message: This message has been issued because some minor flooding to low lying land, roads and riverside areas is likely from this evening and into tomorrow morning. River levels are rising due to rain this afternoon. Areas most at risk are low lying roads and riverside areas in South Creake and Burnham Thorpe, including parts of the B1355. The forecast is for further rain this evening and overnight, which may mean river levels continue to rise.   Take care on riverside footpaths and don't put yourself in unnecessary danger. We are monitoring the situation and will update this message by 9am tomorrow, Monday 20 September.
